entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as strolling toward the barrier between platforms nine and ten, pushing Harry's trolley and apparently very interested in the InterCity 125 that had just arrived at platform nine.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having his trolley pushed by Mr. Weasley and receiving a meaningful look from him.

entities.name: intercity 125
entities.description: The InterCity 125 is described as having just arrived at platform nine.

entities.name: platform nine
entities.description: Platform nine is mentioned as the location where Mr. Weasley and Harry are standing.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy is described as panting and having apparently taken the barrier at a run.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as catching Harry's eye and turning away to hide their laughter.

entities.name: penelope
entities.description: Penelope is described as a girl with long, curly hair who Percy is trying to impress.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as joining the remaining Weasleys.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is described as a scarlet steam engine puffing smoke over a platform packed with witches and wizards.

entities.name: barrier
entities.description: The barrier between platforms nine and ten is mentioned as the location where Mr. Weasley and Harry are standing.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is accompanying Harry, pushing his trolley.
Percy is trying to impress Penelope with his shiny badge.
Ginny and Harry are sharing laughter together.
Hermione is joining the remaining Weasleys.
